# Module: tf.contrib.factorization

Ops and modules related to factorization.



Defined in [`contrib/factorization/__init__.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/factorization/__init__.py).

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Classes

[`class GMM`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/GMM): An estimator for GMM clustering.

[`class GmmAlgorithm`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/GmmAlgorithm): Tensorflow Gaussian mixture model clustering class.

[`class KMeans`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/KMeans): Creates the graph for k-means clustering.

[`class KMeansClustering`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/KMeansClustering): An Estimator for K-Means clustering.

[`class WALSMatrixFactorization`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/WALSMatrixFactorization): An Estimator for Weighted Matrix Factorization, using the WALS method.

[`class WALSModel`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/WALSModel): A model for Weighted Alternating Least Squares matrix factorization.

## Functions

[`gmm(...)`](../../tf/contrib/factorization/gmm): Creates the graph for Gaussian mixture model (GMM) clustering.
